biotools.summary: Aan algorithm to estimate the binding propensity of protein-RNA pairs. By combining secondary structure, hydrogen bonding and van der Waals contributions, catRAPID predicts protein-RNA associations with great accuracy.

bioschemas.name: catRAPID
